page.title: 01Abermorddu & District
page.content: This is a predominantly semi-rural block,where land cover is dominated by farmland and mixed woodland in which can be found the small villages of Cymau,Cefnybedd,Ffrith,Sydallt and Abermorddu. The area lies between the{Clwyd} towns of{Wrexham}and{Mold}and is within easy reach of{Deeside,Chester,Wirral }and {Merseyside }areas which provide jobs in a variety of service industries as well as light and heavy industry. {Local government}is administered by Clwyd C.C. and by Alyn & Deeside District Council and Wrexham Maelor Borough Council. The A541 carries the heaviest{traffic andthe area is served by the Crosville Bus Co. and by British Rail. Most of the communities have their own social centres which are well supported.
